invitationmsg:
The user 

<fromuser> has added you to the Etherpad private group <groupname>.
You can now begin to work collaboratively with the group members and read, edit any pad within this group.

 Why to wait? Click here to get started: <url>
registrationtext:
Hello,

Your registration at Etherpad was successfull! To complete your registration please click on the following link: <url> 
After completing registration, please log in with your new account.
resetpwmsg: Your new Password for your etherpad Account: <password>
invitateunregisterednmsg: <fromuser> has added you to the Group: <groupname>. Please register at <url> to enter the group!
